Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm constantly in a state of adjustment

Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe I'll be 48 and die in the gutter in Paris

Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: People have the power to redeem the work of fools

Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: My sunglasses are like my guitar

Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: An artist is somebody who enters into competition with God

Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If I've learned one thing in life, it's not to be so judgmental of other people

Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I dreamed of having a book of my own, of writing one that I could put on a shelf

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: Life was always a matter of waiting for the right moment to act

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can lie, no one can hide anything, when he looks directly into someone's eyes

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: You drown not by falling into a river, but by staying submerged in it

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: The good old days, when each idea had an owner, are gone forever

Quote.Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote.QuoteValue: Every blessing ignored becomes a curse

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: Enthusiasm is everything. It must be taut and vibrating like a guitar string

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: Brazil eats, sleeps and drinks football. It lives football!

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is practice

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: The level of football in England is the top. English football is the leader in the world

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: The bicycle kick is not easy to do. I scored 1,283 goals, and only two or three were bicycle kicks

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever you go, there are three icons that everyone knows: Jesus Christ, Pele and Coca-Cola

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: A penalty is a cowardly way to score

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: Pele doesn't die. Pele will never die. Pele is going to go on for ever

Quote.Author: Pele
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't give education to people, it is easy to manipulate them

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Rank does not confer privilege or give power. It imposes responsibility

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Today knowledge has power. It controls access to opportunity and advancement

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to predict the future is to create it

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all

Quote.Author: Peter Drucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you make the right decision, sometimes you make the decision right

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better to be healthy alone than sick with someone else

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only lonely if you're not there for you

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone faces the challenge of finding meaning to their suffering

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you just got to give yourself what you wish someone else would give you

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need a pack of wild horses to learn how to make a sandwich

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: Successful weight loss takes programming, not willpower

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need a rope to pinch a stranger's butt

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: It's so much easier to tell people what they want to hear instead of what they need to hear

Quote.Author: Phil McGraw
Quote.QuoteValue: Awareness without action is worthless

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: The most satisfying thing in life is to have been able to give a large part of one's self to others

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing old is like being increasingly penalized for a crime you haven't committed

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter if the water is cold or warm if you're going to have to wade through it anyway

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: Being happy is a matter of personal taste

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: It is our duty as men and women to proceed as though the limits of our abilities do not exist

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is round so that friendship may encircle it

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: The universe as we know it is a joint product of the observer and the observed

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: He that will believe only what he can fully comprehend must have a long head or a very short creed

Quote.Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote.QuoteValue: Evolution is a light illuminating all facts, a curve that all lines must follow

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: Human behavior flows from three main sources: desire, emotion, and knowledge

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: The beginning is the most important part of the work

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest wealth is to live content with little

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is knowing what not to fear

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life

Quote.Author: Plato
Quote.QuoteValue: There are three classes of men; lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a journey. When we stop, things don't go right

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: Christmas is joy, religious joy, an inner joy of light and peace

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: Find new ways to spread the word of God to every corner of the world

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have the duty to do good

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: A little bit of mercy makes the world less cold and more just

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: Right now, we don't have a very good relation with creation

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: Wretched are those who are vindictive and spiteful

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: The people of God want pastors, not clergy acting like bureaucrats or government officials

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: Young people are just as attracted to the truth as they are convenience and expediency

Quote.Author: Pope Francis
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot be in a position of power and destroy the life of another person

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: An excuse is worse and more terrible than a lie, for an excuse is a lie guarded

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: As the family goes, so goes the nation and so goes the whole world in which we live

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom consists not in doing what we like, but in having the right to do what we ought

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: Violence and arms can never resolve the problems of men

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: Stupidity is also a gift of God, but one mustn't misuse it

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: The future starts today, not tomorrow

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is never defeated, and I could add, the history of Ireland proves it

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a sweet tooth for song and music. This is my Polish sin

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not abandon yourselves to despair. We are the Easter people and hallelujah is our song

Quote.Author: Pope John Paul II
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope to have communion with the people, that is the most important thing

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: You just got with the flow because life is just all about how you feel

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just myself. That's the best way to put it

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to be quiet and play guitar and just chill

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what people think of me

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: Stevie Nicks is dope

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a fun guy

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm hungry. I'm ready to grow

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I might wear skinny pants one day; I might wear thrift shop pants the next day

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: If you like something, rock it. If you want to rock a cape every day, go for it

Quote.Author: Post Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty happy guy

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a dark side to everything

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Despite everything, no one can dictate who you are to other people

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to longevity is to learn every aspect of music that you can

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I like constructive criticism from smart people

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Too much freedom can lead to the soul's decay

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Each audience is different

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look in the Bible there's no birthdays

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I have friends that are gay, and we study the Bible together

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't talk about the past

Quote.Author: Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: I ain't mad at anybody. I don't have any enemies

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: Family is the most important thing in the world

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't go by the rule book... I lead from the heart, not the head

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to be a free spirit. Some don't like that, but that's the way I am

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a princess isn't all it's cracked up to be

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are happy you can forgive a great deal

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is just a journey

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't comfort the afflicted with afflicting the comfortable

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: Only do what your heart tells you

Quote.Author: Princess Diana
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear my heart on my sleeve

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom

Quote.Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote.QuoteValue: Depth of friendship does not depend on length of acquaintance

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: People only see what they are prepared to see

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: With the past, I have nothing to do; nor with the future. I live now

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: If the stars should appear but one night every thousand years how man would marvel and stare

Quote.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: Living at risk is jumping off the cliff and building your wings on the way down

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: Video games are a waste of time for men with nothing else to do. Real brains don't do that

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: If God treats you well by teaching you a disastrous lesson, you never forget it

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: I discovered me in the library. I went to find me in the library

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: We are an impossibility in an impossible universe

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: I love all of the arts. I love motion pictures. I love stage. I love theater

Quote.Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote.QuoteValue: Journalism keeps you planted in the earth

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: Space Mountain may be the oldest ride in the park, but it has the longest line

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: Without your health, you've got nothing going on. I thank God every day for good health

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: All the women want to be with me, all the men want to be like me

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: To be the man, you gotta beat the man!

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to be the man, you have to beat the man

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm every woman's dream and every man's nightmare

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: None of this was written to hurt anybody's feelings

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't like it, learn to love it!

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: I bleed like nobody else

Quote.Author: Ric Flair
Quote.QuoteValue: I can take more punishment than anyone in the business

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: A good leader doesn't get stuck behind a desk

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: Starting your own business isn't just a job - it's a way of life

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: Material things are delightful, but they're not important

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in benevolent dictatorship provided I am the dictator

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: A business has to be involving, it has to be fun, and it has to exercise your creative instincts

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of delegation is one of the key skills any entrepreneur must master

Quote.Author: Richard Branson
Quote.QuoteValue: Like getting into a bleeding competition with a blood bank

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: A delusion is something that people believe in despite a total lack of evidence

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: If something is true, no amount of wishful thinking will change it

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Discrimination is not liberal. Arguing against discrimination is not intolerance

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: We admit that we are like apes, but we seldom realise that we are apes

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I am against religion because it teaches us to be satisfied with not understanding the world

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: How can you take seriously someone who likes to believe something because he finds it 'comforting'?

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: My personal feeling is that understanding evolution led me to atheism

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Islands are natural workshops of evolution

Quote.Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: People believe the only alternative to randomness is intelligent design

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born not knowing and have had only a little time to change that here and there

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself and you are the easiest person to fool

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: What one fool can understand, another can

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could explain it to the average person, I wouldn't have been worth the Nobel Prize

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: Once I get on a puzzle, I can't get off

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality must take precedence over public relations, for nature cannot be fooled

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: See that the imagination of nature is far, far greater than the imagination of man

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that a scientist looking at nonscientific problems is just as dumb as the next guy

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: Physics has a history of synthesizing many phenomena into a few theories

Quote.Author: Richard P. Feynman
Quote.QuoteValue: Gravitation is, so far, not understandable in terms of other phenomena

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: I never learned from a man who agreed with me

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: Never underestimate the power of human stupidity

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who considers protocol unimportant has never dealt with a cat

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: The universe never did make sense; I suspect it was built on government contract

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: They didn't want it good, they wanted it Wednesday

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: You can have peace. Or you can have freedom. Don't ever count on having both at once

Quote.Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, politeness is a sine qua non of civilization

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - I believe that God put us in this jolly world to be happy and enjoy life

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - We never fail when we try to do our duty, we always fail when we neglect to do it

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - A Scout smiles and whistles under all circumstances

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - If you make listening and observation your occupation you will gain much more than you can by talk

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - Trust should be the basis for all our moral training

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - The spirit is there in every boy; it has to be discovered and brought to light

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - An individual step in character training is to put responsibility on the individual

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - Success in training the boy depends largely on the Scoutmaster's own personal example

Quote.Author: Robert Bade
Quote.QuoteValue: owell - The more responsibility the Scoutmaster gives his patrol leaders, the more they will respond

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: The woods are lovely, dark and deep. But I have promises to keep, and miles to go before I sleep

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry is when an emotion has found its thought and the thought has found words

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgive me my nonsense, as I also forgive the nonsense of those that think they talk sense

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never remembers her age

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: A jury consists of twelve persons chosen to decide who has the better lawyer

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way out is always through

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing can make injustice just but mercy

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't ever take a fence down until you know why it was put up

Quote.Author: Robert Frost
Quote.QuoteValue: A liberal is a man too broadminded to take his own side in a quarrel

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Some men see things as they are, and ask why. I dream of things that never were, and ask why not

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Tragedy is a tool for the living to gain wisdom, not a guide by which to live

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Progress is a nice word. But change is its motivator. And change has its enemies

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: One-fifth of the people are against everything all the time

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I can go back to being ruthless again

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that, as long as there is plenty, poverty is evil

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: The free way of life proposes ends, but it does not prescribe means

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: The right to vote is the easiest of all rights to grant

Quote.Author: Robert Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: In the last analysis, our every right is only worth what our lawyer makes it worth

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If Heaven exists, to know that there's laughter, that would be a great thing

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Never pick a fight with an ugly person, they've got nothing to lose

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: People say satire is dead. It's not dead; it's alive and living in the White House

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada is like a loft apartment over a really great party

Quote.Author: Robin Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy can be a cathartic way to deal with personal trauma

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: I found there was only one way to look thin: hang out with fat people

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife wants sex in the back of the car and she wants me to drive

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife was afraid of the dark... then she saw me naked and now she's afraid of the light

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: I drink too much. The last time I gave a urine sample it had an olive in it

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: This morning when I put on my underwear I could hear the fruit-of-the-loom guys laughing at me

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: The way my luck is running, if I was a politician I would be honest

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: My uncle's dying wish - he wanted me on his lap. He was in the electric chair

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: I told my dentist my teeth are going yellow. he told me to wear a brown tie

Quote.Author: Rodney Dangerfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Some dog I got too. We call him Egypt. Because in every room he leaves a pyramid

Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means

Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone

Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: When you can't make them see the light, make them feel the heat

Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music
